title: ‘The audacity is unreal’: Entitled neighbor demands homeowner remove their car from their driveway because it's ‘ruining’ the view from the neighbor's window
description: Summer is almost upon us… and that means the neighbor feuds are coming back in full force because everyone is going to be relaxing on their porches and planting new orange trees (and complaining about both). Having a good neighbor is great, but having a neighbor to feud with and complain about on Reddit is amazing—truly.Folks like to convince themselves they're entitled to things that don't belong to them… even driveways that are owned by their neighbors. We've not posted about Karens in quite a bit, but we think the one in this story takes the cake.This homeowner is told by their Karen neighbor to move their car from their own driveway because it's 'ruining' the view she has from her porch. In the wise words of the poster: 'The audacity in unreal'. Scroll below to read the entire story.
author: Lana DeGaetano
excerpt: ‘The audacity is unreal’: Entitled neighbor demands homeowner remove their car from their driveway because it's ‘ruining’ the view from the neighbor's window - The internet has generated a huge amount of laughs from cats and FAILS. And we all out of cats.

html:
Summer is almost upon us… and that means the neighbor feuds are coming back in full force because everyone is going to be relaxing on their porches and planting new orange trees (and complaining about both). Having a good neighbor is great, but having a neighbor to feud with and complain about on Reddit is amazing—truly.

Folks like to convince themselves they're entitled to things that don't belong to them… even driveways that are owned by their neighbors. We've not posted about Karens in quite a bit, but we think the one in this story takes the cake.

This homeowner is told by their Karen neighbor to move their car from their own driveway because it's 'ruining' the view she has from her porch. In the wise words of the poster: 'The audacity in unreal'. Scroll below to read the entire story.
